name: Eldegoss
description: The Cotton Bloom Pokémon. The seeds attached to its cotton fluff are full of nutrients. It spreads them on the wind so that plants and other Pokémon can benefit from them.

abilities.name: Drifter
abilities.description: In windy conditions (DM discretion), this Pokémon's flying (hover) speed is doubled until windy conditions cease.

abilities.name: Cotton Down
abilities.description: When this Pokémon is damaged, cotton spews everywhere. The area within 10ft of this Pokémon becomes difficult terrain for everything except Grass monotypes until the beginning of its next turn.

abilities.name: Regenerator
abilities.description: Once per long rest, this Pokémon regains hit points equal to its level when it returns to its Pokéball.

abilities.name: Effect Spore
abilities.description: When hit by a melee attack, roll a d4. On a 4, deal an amount of grass damage equal to your proficiency modifier to your attacker.

specialAbilityText: This Pokémon always has the Drifter ability, along with one other.
